text: Lake Tanganyika is a large lake in the Great Rift Valley of central Africa. The lake is divided between four countries â€“ Burundi, Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC), Tanzania and Zambia. It is the longest fresh water lake in the world and the second deepest. ==Other websites== Tanganyika Tanganyika Category:Geography of Zambia Category:Geography of Burundi
title: Lake Tanganyika
